text: Det kunne vært deg () is a 1952 Norwegian comedy film directed by Kåre Bergstrøm and Henki Kolstad, starring Inger Marie Andersen, Henki Kolstad and Wenche Foss. Recently wed Maisen (Andersen) and Pompen (Kolstad) make a new acquaintance in Cornelius, a lifelong bachelor. The plot is about maisen is newly married but on the way home her husband harald losses the key to their flat. They ask there neighbor for help and then their marriage falters, the neighbor steps up. ==External links== * * Category:1952 films Category:1952 comedy films Category:Norwegian films Category:Norwegian comedy films
title: Det kunne vært deg
